alert.note: Alert for Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 2:58PM MDT until April 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 7 PM today for strong winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 234, 236 and 237, which includes Kiowa, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 AM to 9 PM Saturday for strong winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, 226 through 233, 235 and 237...which includes the San Luis Valley, the I-25 corridor, and Crowley, Otero, Bent, Las Animas and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 234...236 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 234 and 236. * Winds...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Timing...until 7 PM this evening. * Relative Humidity...10 to 15 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar
